rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with natural light and ventilation. Features a reception counter.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for ample daylight and Vastu-compliant east-facing window for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room. Includes eco-friendly lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, energy-efficient kitchen with recycled materials and integrated ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and south-east facing window for optimal Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (First Floor)
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and private balcony.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the master bedroom with eco-friendly fixtures.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (First Floor)
rooms.description: Well-appointed bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 (First Floor)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to complement the residential design.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Compact but functional living space for house help with essential amenities and privacy.
